CustomField.formula:
(IF(ISPICKVAL(Writing_Story__c,"1"),1,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Writing_Story__c,"2"),2,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Writing_Story__c,"3"),3,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Writing_Story__c,"4"),4,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Writing_Story__c,"5"),5,0))
+
(IF(ISPICKVAL(Writing_Style__c,"1"),1,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Writing_Style__c,"2"),2,0) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Writing_Style__c,"3"),3,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Writing_Style__c,"4"),4,0)+ IF(ISPICKVAL(Writing_Style__c,"5"),5,0))
CustomField.label: Writing Score
